  • Used ZenDesk, Atlassian, and Google products to collaborate on processes and supporting documentation.

TECHNICAL SUPPORT SUPERVISOR

FALCON TRADING SYSTEMS (TRADINGCOMPUTERS.COM)

2007-05 - 2010-05

As a grassroots employee of a Wyoming internet startup, I supplemented my college experience with hands-on knowledge and was proud to be a developmental part of many functions:

  • Promoted to supervisor within first 6 months, I managed a team of 5 technicians working phone, email, and chat support to financial traders, brokers, and money-market makers.
  • Routinely developed product knowledge by being active in the process of building, testing and distributing customized high-performance multi-monitor PCs for financial services.
  • Defined systems and policies for our expanding customer service team and reported on-field issues to our production and engineering teams.

Additionally, I provided hardware, software, and networking component end-user technical assistance, while learning IT skills essential in my career path such as:

  • Learning how to optimize hardware processing to help prevent degradation of production equipment.
  • Performing non-destructive stress testing for production computers in sales queues and R&D.
  • Educating self on electronic trading and financial techs to help better support client knowledge.
  • Familiarizing self with programming and high-performance networking concepts.

Technical Writing
